about_the_game:
Waking up in the dark forest, you have lost your memory, and you are led forward by three hints in the palm of your hand. As a bunny girl, you come to a circus in the forest, only to find yourself in a world full of unknown fears. The non-human spectators in the audience, the ubiquitous rules, and the alien monsters that can appear at any time make your path to survival challenging.
You have to try to find clues and unravel hidden secrets in this spooky circus. The rules that are written everywhere are the key to your survival, but you can't fully trust them because you don't know if there's a trap hidden in them. While you're dodging the alien monsters, you'll also have to find a way to escape the mist-shrouded forest. And where is the person you are determined to save? Will the countless cycles lead you to find the answer? In this world full of mysteries, will you be able to find your name and achieve your goal of escape and salvation?

Game Features
1. Mysterious and eerie atmosphere: From the forest environment to the circus setting, there is an eerie atmosphere, leaving the player in a constant state of tension and uneasiness, not knowing what will happen to them in the next moment.

2. Unique Rule Setting: There are tons of weird rules scattered all over the place, which are key to the player's survival, but there may be hidden traps or misdirection in them, requiring careful analysis and judgment from the player.

3. Diverse Characters: Encounter a variety of weird characters whose actions are elusive, some of which may help the player, while others may lead the player into a desperate situation, adding to the uncertainty and challenge of the game.


Game Rules
1. In an atmosphere full of mystery and danger, players need to solve various puzzles to advance the plot, obtain key clues, understand the secrets of the circus and the cause of their own amnesia.
2. In the process of exploration, it is necessary to pay attention to carefully observe the environment, collect various clues and information, carefully interpret the rules, and make reasonable decisions according to different situations. Due to the tense and terrifying atmosphere of the game, it is recommended that players stay calm while playing and do not let fear affect their judgment.
3. At different stages of the game, players may be faced with various options. For example, when faced with a specific plot branch, you need to decide the next course of action.What's more, when interpreting a rule, determine whether a rule should be followed. These choices will affect the direction and ending of the story, and may lead players to enter different side plots or usher in different fates.

highlighted.name: 完美结局：欢迎来到森林马戏团

  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: 2Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 10GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is a rule-based puzzle game full of mysterious and thrilling elements. You will play a character who wakes up in the forest and loses all memories, forced to become a circus bunny girl. Strive to find and abide by rules that will keep you safe and unlock the secrets of the circus.
